content: And the angel said unto them, Fear not: for, behold, I bring you good tidings of great joy, which shall be to all people. For unto you is born this day in the city of David a Saviour, which is Christ the Lord. And this shall be a sign unto you; Ye shall find the babe wrapped in swaddling clothes, lying in a manger. And suddenly there was with the angel a multitude of the heavenly host praising God, and saying, Glory to God in the highest, and on earth peace, good will toward men.
translations: ita:E l'angelo disse loro﹕ Non temete, perché ecco, vi porto la buona novella di una grande gioia, che sarà di tutto il popo
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Hybrid (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
